title: TextLine4
body:
<<WAIT>><<0.5>>
<<AUTO>><<0.5>>
<<TEXBOX>><<UP>>
<<OVERRIDE>><<both>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine4_1>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine4_2>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine4_3>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine4_4>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine4_5>>
"So I watch what's left of my life like a security guard on the night shift..."
<<BREAK>>
<<WAIT>><<8>>
<<END>>

title: TextLine5
body:
<<WAIT>><<0.5>>
<<AUTO>><<0.5>>
<<TEXBOX>><<UP>>
<<OVERRIDE>><<both>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine5_1>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine5_2>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine5_3>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine5_4>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine5_5>>
"Checking the locks when I know I don't need to, pacing the perimeter of someplace nobody's going to break into..."
<<BREAK>>
<<WAIT>><<8>>
<<END>>

title: TextLine6
body:
<<WAIT>><<0.5>>
<<AUTO>><<0.5>>
<<TEXBOX>><<UP>>
<<OVERRIDE>><<both>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine6_1>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine6_2>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine6_3>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine6_4>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine6_5>>
"Except that you never know. Something could happen. So you keep watch..."
<<BREAK>>
<<WAIT>><<8>>
<<END>>

title: TextLine7

<<TEXBOX>><<UP>>

<<DESTROY>><<TextLine7_4>>
<<DESTROY>><<TextLine7_5>>
"They donâ€™t pay security guards just because they're a few bodies short on the payroll."

title: InvisibleWall
body:
<<WAIT>><<0>>
<<OVERRIDE>><<clear>>
<<IF>><<Longwalk b== false end>> 4:7
<<WALK.PG>><<REL:R:R:walk>>
The bus will be here soon...
<<BREAK>>
<<END>>

title: Sign
body:
<<WAIT>><<0>>
<<BOX.VISIBLE>>
This sign shows the bus' timetable
<<BREAK>>
It will be here. Eventually.
<<BREAK>>
<<END>>
